name: BioCell Collagen® Halal
description: BioCell Collagen® Halal is certified by the Islamic Information Documentation and Certification GmbH (IIDC), which is an independent and internationally accredited inspection and certification center for halal foods and services. Our Halal collagen ingredient is a clinically studied dietary ingredient composed of naturally occurring hydrolyzed collagen type II peptides, chondroitin sulfate, and hyaluronic acid. BioCell's unique matrix is not a blend of individual ingredients. Numerous safety, efficacy, and bioavailability research studies, including seven human clinical trials, confirm that BioCell Collagen® promotes active joints, youthful-looking skin, and healthy connective tissues.
